item.description:
Bears vs. Packers. The NFL's longest rivalry with 185 games and between them 22 NFL championships and 48 Hall of Famers. The Bears still hold the record for the most total wins and have a record of 92-87-6 vs the Packers. This is also a huge game with playoff implications.  If the Packers win, they win the division.  The Bears need to win 2 out of the remaining 3 and things to fall right.  We are the guests of the Chicago Sports Club. Bears-Packers, what is more Midwestern than that? Courtside has been remodeled with a new sound system. In the bar area, the game will be on with sound.  I would like to meet each of you and hear any ideas that you have for this club.

About the Courtside Restaurant and Pub:

Meet your friends and family at the courtside any day of the week.. We have  fully stocked bars with 5 different beers on tap and  different bottled beers. We're ready to help you have a great time as you enjoy our great food, from appetizers and fresh salads to steaks and pizza. With live entertainment, great food, great drinks, and the kind of party you've been looking for why would you go anywhere else? The courtside offers great seating comfort for you to kick up your feet and just relax with the crowd or watch some Monday Night Football on our HD tv screens.

http://courtside.wix.com/main

Menu:

http://courtside.wix.com/karaoke#!menu/cm65

Directions:

Directions by Green Line on the M.B.T.A. subwayTake the M.B.T.A.'s Green Line subway to Lechmere Station. From Lechmere, follow Cambridge Street (in the same direction that the train was traveling) three blocks to Third Street. The Courtside is 1/2 block down on your right after the traffic light at Third Street
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a Meetup sign
item.name: Bears Vs Packers
